### `r subcorridor_results_line$subcorridor_name ` Analytics 

Interpretation 

#### Subcorridor Daily Analytics
```{r echo=FALSE}

table_1 <- subcorridor_results_line$route_analytics[[1]] %>% bind_rows(subcorridor_results_line$analytics[[1]] %>% mutate(route_id = "Total"))
  
kable(table_1, booktabs = TRUE, align = 'c',format.args = list(big.mark = ","),digits=1) %>%
 kable_styling(latex_options = "scale_down")  %>%
 row_spec(dim(table_1)[1], bold = T) %>% # format last row
 column_spec(1, italic = T) %>%  # format first column
 scroll_box(width = "100%")
```
